text: Mohammadreza Abbasi (born July 27, 1996) is an Iranian Footballer Winger who currently plays for Zob Ahan. ==Club career== ===Zob Ahan=== Abbasi was part of Zob Ahan Academy since 2010. He promoted to first team by Yahya Golmohammadi as summer 2014 with 3 years contract.http://www.farsnews.com/newstext.php?nn=13930420000237 He made his debut for Zob Ahan as September 4, 2014 against Saipa as a starter.http://iranleague.ir/MatchDetails/6314 ==Club Career Statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Division !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Hazfi Cup !colspan="2"|Asia !colspan="2"|Total |- !
